snippet: LEAD: With California's June 5 primary just two weeks away, national and international attention is turning to America's megastate on the Pacific. California is in the midst of an unprecedented social experiment with vast ramifications....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: With California's June 5 primary just two weeks away, national and international attention is turning to America's megastate on the Pacific. California is in the midst of an unprecedented social experiment with vast ramifications.

byline.original: By Bill Bradley; Bill Bradley is author of the forthcoming ''The United States of California.''
